entries.femaleVariant: Ladies and gentlemen, Us Cracks and Kerrryyyy Euryodyyyyne!
Hey.
<mothertongue l="jpn" m="Konban-wa!" b="" a=" Good evening, Night City!"/>
Congrats, Ker. Decent show.
I guess Kovachek's got you wrapped around his little finger.
Very funny.
But yeah. Not about to let him get away with it. Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but the bastard's gonna regret makin' me sign those papers.
You try to get outta that deal with the label?
See, I thought he was representing me, not the label. Fuck, was I wrong.
Nothin' you can do about it?
I could wipe him. Other than that? Nada. In the corp's pocket, won't cross 'em. And the corp's got the rights to my songs, my lyrics...
Fuck. If they ever wanna plaster my face on baby helmets, they can. But hey, price of fame, right?
Ahhh... Let's be real – say I break contract. Then what?
Who's gonna release my new tracks? Who's gonna deal with distribution, promotion, influencers, media?
You'd be free.
Seriously? Free to sing until you're blue in the face, nobody hearin' a thing? It's just another kind of cage.
V!
Hey. Come with me. I want you to meet someone.
"Love at first sight," huh?
Many different kind of loving. And different beginning!
Eh, you can talk biz later. Come with, V, wanna show you somethin'.
Kerry, great to see you so on top of your game! You and Us Cracks – SHOCKING! How'd it happen?
Simple – rock's not dead. It's evolved, yet again. And I'm part of that evolution.
Kerry, gotta say you look great! Uh, but it wasn't that long ago you were fighting depression, uh, thinking of hanging up your guitar for good? What changed?
Girls, how was it to work with the legendary Kerry Eurodyne?
Kerry! Over here! Here!
You're breathtaking, Kerry!
Thank you, thank you... You're breathtaking!
Thanks, but I really gotta run, late for my next thing already.
Let's go. Unless you feel like giving a few more interviews.
Ahh... Can't get enough of this view. I love lookin' at this city from above.
Well?
[Kiss Kerry] Yes.
You'll be fine. Even without me.
Fuck, s-sorry, V. I like you lots, but we-- this ain't goin' anywhere.
Umm, no worries. Sorry, never mind.
entries.maleVariant: No worries. Sorry, never mind.

entries.femaleVariant: Should get back. Everyone downstairs is waiting... for you.
entries.maleVariant: We should get back. Everyone downstairs is waitin'... for you.

entries.femaleVariant: I know, I know. Aim to knock back a few to this town tonight. And to me in it.
Told 'em to shut the place down for the day.

entries.maleVariant: It's just all so fucking crazy.

entries.femaleVariant: Hey!
[Sit]
Hey, sit. Want you to meet someone.
[Stand] Later, Spector.
Later, Spector.
Sit, sit, c'mon.
Show me what you got.
Show you one of my favorite spots in Night City.
Thank you! Thank you, dears!
This is V, my, uh... right hand.
It's a wild and crazy ride, but I can't complain.
These girls are energizing, they're electrifying. They asked me to lay down a new track down with 'em... How could I say no? Rest is rock history.
Did I say that? Goes to show you – you shouldn't trust a word that comes outta my mouth. Sweet little lies. Only way I can get at the truth.
<mothertongue l="jpn" m="Suteki! Kakkoii! Kawaii!" b="Kerry-san is most sweet, most lovely man in the world! " a=""/>
<mothertongue l="jpn" m="doki doki" b="We meet Kerry-san when he come to dressing room – it was " a=" – how you say? Love at first sight!"/>
He is wonderful, so sensitive and so, so naughty! Rawrrr! Our Kerry bad boy!
V's the little bird that shows up when I gotta wrap up and run. Sorry.
V! V, quick question! What's it like hanging with Kerry Eurodyne? A living legend!
He'd be in jail right now if it wasn't for me.
No comment.
It's a wild and crazy ride.
If I told you what I had seen and done with Mr. Eurodyne...
entries.maleVariant: If I told you what I've seen and done with Mr. Eurodyne...

entries.femaleVariant: No comment.
It's... simply legendary. That's all I got to say.
Well, as you might imagine, it is... legendary.
"Love at first sight?"
You look great.
Great tune.
Mighta brought Kerry around, but I remain skeptical.
You look great.
New track – pretty sweet.
entries.maleVariant: New track – it's pretty sweet.

entries.femaleVariant: Still... can't help but think that mess with the single was your doing. You mighta hazed Kerry, but you won't haze me.
entries.maleVariant: Still... can't help but think that that mess with the single was your doin'. You mighta hazed Kerry, but you won't haze me.

entries.femaleVariant: V, Spector. An old friend. Met him walkin' in Memphis, off Beale, ages ago.
Don't come here often, but when I do... it's important.
Should I feel special?
Don't let it go to your head.
entries.maleVariant: Maybe.

entries.femaleVariant: Only place you fall asleep thinkin' you're special, then wake up knowin' you're no one.
Talk to me.
See, thought I was afraid everybody'd think me another corposlave. But I was just afraid I'd be in someone's shadow again.
Maybe it's time you stopped being afraid.
You're at the top. Don't need to prove anything, to anyone.
Time you stopped bein' afraid. Don't need to be.
entries.maleVariant: It's time you stopped bein' afraid. You don't need to be.

entries.femaleVariant: [Lean] Amazing view.
[Lean] Something's bugging you.
[Lean] Glad we got a moment to ourselves.
Sometimes wonder if I'll ever see anything more beautiful...
entries.maleVariant: Wow. Sometimes I wonder if I'll ever see anything more beautiful...

entries.femaleVariant: Kerry? Can see something's eatin' you.
entries.maleVariant: Kerry? I can see something's eatin' ya.

entries.femaleVariant: Glad we get this moment to ourselves.
I have. Doesn't matter, though. Night City's not somethin' you ever forget. Just doesn't letcha.
Think I get it.
What do you mean?
Keep thinkin' about our conversation at Caliente.
Whaddaya mean? C'mon, can tell something's wrong.
entries.maleVariant: Whaddaya mean? C'mon, I can tell something's wrong.

entries.femaleVariant: Thought the whole Us Cracks thing was me bein' afraid. Of being exposed, of people finally seeing me as another piece of merch, another cog in the corpomachine.
Us Cracks, you and the slaves to the corpogrind?
entries.maleVariant: Us Cracks, you and the slaves to the corpogrind.

entries.femaleVariant: Mhm. Guess I wasn't completely honest with you. Or myself, for that matter.
You can tell me.
Little too heavy for me right now.
No truth to that?
There is. But that's not what's important. Real problem's deeper. Way deeper.
Sellout Eurodyne, showin' Asian pop starlets a good time for cash, fame and the chance to remind people he's still fuckin' alive.
Think I know what you mean.
entries.maleVariant: I think I know what you mean.

entries.femaleVariant: You ever feel like the city doesn't give you a choice? You either burn alive in it, or you never existed at all. Shit.
Kerry. What's wrong? Tell me.
Mhm. Brought you here 'cause I wanted to talk. With someone outside that whole shitshow downstairs.
entries.maleVariant: Me too. Get the sense that we... resonate, ya feel me? So I wanted to talk somethin' out with you.

entries.femaleVariant: What's up?
Again?
Lived in Johnny's for years. Part of the scenery, machinery, helpin' 'im shine brighter.
But you did make it.
Johnny thought you just chickened out.
That why he left Samurai? Fuck…
But you did make it. Big, too. Only diehards remember Samurai now. You – everybody knows your name.
Johnny figured you chickened out. Couldn't take the pressure, so you left Samurai.
You think that changes anything?
Yeah, I know. But he was wrong. Decided to start fightin' for myself. Still keepin' that up.
Night City's a city of shadows. Done everything I could to walk clear of 'em for years. Fuck...
Think it's that simple?
entries.maleVariant: Hmph, think you can drive the shadows away?

entries.femaleVariant: I still got a lot to prove to this city, but you... you're at the top. City's yours. What's there to be afraid of?
entries.maleVariant: I still got a lot to prove to this city, but you... you're at the top. The city's yours. So what's there to be afraid of?

entries.femaleVariant: Eh, we'll talk about this again someday. Once you're in my shoes.
Think it's in the cards for me?
You're strong. City couldn't swallow you if it tried.
entries.maleVariant: I'm sure it is.

entries.femaleVariant: [Kiss] Hold you to that.
Should probably get back.
[Kiss Kerry] Shadows'll fade before you.
I'll even protect you from yourself.

entries.maleVariant: Shadows'll fade. I can feel it.

entries.femaleVariant: You'll be fine… without me, too.
Hold you to your word on that.

entries.maleVariant: Here with you, lookin' at the city – want this moment to last forever. Want it to hang, frozen in time, bathed in these gorgeous neon lights.
Moment's gonna pass, isn't it?
And we'll gladly go back to the chaos down below.
Kerry never did get it – only one thing worse than unfulfilled dreams.
Dreams that come true.

entries.femaleVariant: Ahh... I'm gonna stay up here a sec longer.
You go ahead, downstairs. Drink to this city. And to me in it.

entries.maleVariant: Let's delta. Chaos awaits.

entries.femaleVariant: Thanks, though. For everything.
Fuck. Yeah, sure hope so.
But I'm gonna stay up here a bit longer. You go ahead.
OK. See ya.
Mrrrow! You do too!
V should be in our next-o video!
Or be personal bodyguard!
Little busy at the moment, but... I'll call you if I'm hard up.
entries.maleVariant: I'm a little busy at the moment, but I'll call you if I'm hard up.

entries.femaleVariant: All thank you to Kerry-san. His rockerboy charm and energy.
Kerry help us see all what Night City is. Immerse in it. Super awesome fun!
Ohhh nooo! Do not say such thing, V!
It not true! We never do anything so terrible!
<mothertongue l="jpn" m="mecha-deka-na-egao!" b="Best thing forget all and offer everybody " a=""/>
V!
But hey – can't complain.
V, what the hell?!
Lemme just say – Kerry'd be rottin' in a cell right now if not for me.
entries.maleVariant: Lemme just say – Kerry'd be rottin' in a cell right now if it wasn't for me.

entries.femaleVariant: But the juiciest details I keep to myself.
Of course, Mr. Eurodyne. Special rate for your friends.

entries.maleVariant: Is he...?
Does it matter?
Nah, not anymore.

entries.femaleVariant: Hey.
HE's got preem stuff. Give you a friends 'n' family discount, too.
OK, we'll talk later.
Let's see what you got.
Be back later, we'll talk biz.
entries.maleVariant: I'll be back later, we'll talk biz.

entries.femaleVariant: Sure thing.
Come with, V, wanna show you somethin'.
Now that that's behind us, what's Kerry Eurodyne's next mission? Hit on Kovachek?
Let's see what you got.
entries.maleVariant: Well, let's see what you got.

entries.femaleVariant: Ah, you can talk biz later. Come with, V, wanna show you somethin'.
Show me what you got.
OK, we'll talk later.
Little empty in here.
Speaking of, what's up with Us Cracks? Can't go near 'em, so what? Hit on Kovachek?
entries.maleVariant: Speaking of, what's up with Us Cracks? You can't go near 'em, so what? Hit on Kovachek?

entries.femaleVariant: Heh. Very funny.
But yeah. Not about to let him get away with it. Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but the bastard's gonna regret makin' me sign those papers.
Guess Kovachek's got you wrapped around his little finger.
See, I thought he was representing me, not the label. Fuck, was I wrong.
Nothin' you can do about it?
I could wipe him. Other than that? Nada. In the corp's pocket, won't cross 'em. And the corp's got the rights to my songs, my lyrics...
Fuck. If they ever wanna plaster my face on baby helmets, they can. But hey, price of fame, right?
V, Spector. Old friend. Met him walkin' in Memphis, off Beale, ages ago.
Hey.
He's got preem stuff, might be interested. Give you a friends 'n' family discount, too.
Of course, Mr. Eurodyne. Special rate for your friends.
Be back later, we'll talk biz.
Sure thing.
Come with, V, wanna show you somethin'.
Closed today. Wanted some peace and quiet.
Kerry, really don't have it in me to hash this out now.
entries.maleVariant: Kerry, I really don't have it in me to hash this out now.

entries.femaleVariant: You got something more important to do?
Somethin' lots more important.
Uh-huh. OK, sure, I get it.
Whatever happens, you'll be fine.
Should probably be getting back.
Look, whatever happens, I'm sure you'll stay afloat. It'll be fine.
Hope so. Thanks.
Labels've got 'em all in their pockets. You're out with them, you're out period.
Never believed I'd make it on my own without Silverhand.
Wake up with the same thought every damn day – that I might somehow fade into this town's steam, stench, murk. For good.
OK. See ya.
Ah... Oh.
[Step away] OK. See ya.
[Step away] Guess I'll see ya.
